message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1750000.  It's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know if you're interested.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am unable to meet the price of $1750000. I am willing to pay up to $1600000 for the product. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your offer, I'm unable to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1650000. This still leaves room for both of us to be happy with the deal. Let me know if you're willing to compromise.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I am able to offer $1625000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects the value of the product while staying within my financial limits.
